page.title: 07Playground games.
page.content: The children of Digby School play many games at playtime.The three favourite games are "Chaintig","Tiggy on the lines" and "Leapfrog". "Tig" is a chasing game.The catcher is said to be "on" and when he touches someone he "tigs" them."Tiggy on the lines" is played on lines marked on the playground.You must stay on the lines and get to a safe place called "home". "Chaintig" is a variation of "Tig". If you are caught, you join hands with the catcher to make a chain. In "Leapfrog",you have to vault over your partner's back while they have their hands on their knees.
